title: New: Razmataz Lorry Excitement – Skin (Feat. Natasha Haws)
body:
I guess this is now called ‘doing a **Disclosure**‘.

Without intending to downplay just how great this track is, Newcastle’s **Razmataz Lorry Excitement’s** new track _Skin_, featuring the vocal talents of **Natasha Haws**, has more than a touch of the White Noise boys to it. What really intrigues me about this track, is that it’s quite unlike anything I’ve heard coming from the North East in recent years, just straight up pop orientated dance music, and it’s bloody brilliant.
